Sentencas: This study aims to analyze electrical and thermal energy generation through solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solar PV system.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: The biogas produced through anaerobic digestion, after desulfurization and refinement at 0.25 $/m3 is fed into SOFC.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: This on-site fuel production solves fuel transportation issues.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: The microgrid design simulation software HOMER Pro is utilized for economic, energy, and environmental analysis.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: The electrical and thermal energy produced by the optimum system (SOFC-PV-Batteries) is 328 MWh/year and 513.6 MWh/year, respectively.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: The net present cost is $1.296 million and the levelized energy cost is 0.289 $/kWh.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: The simple payback period for the optimum system is 4.92 years.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: Furthermore, the optimum system reduced carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions up to 19%, 39%, and 41% compared to gas, oil, and coal-based combustion systems, which is a remarkable achievement.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry

Sentencas: This study concludes, SOFC-PV-Batteries based combined heat and power system is efficient and self-sustainable for dairy industries.
Titulo: Techno-economic and performance assessment of a hybrid fuel cell-based combined heat and power system for dairy industry
